embed.title: RoleCaller help.
embed.description: I'm a very simple bot. People ask for a role color, and I make a role and give them that color. Super simple stuff. Let me take you through the commands:

fields.name: .iwant *HEXCODE*
fields.value: This is the basis mode of operation, give a hexcolor and I'll give you a preview of what that would look like as a role color. You can then decide to accept it or not. You've got about an hour to do so before I forget about it.

fields.name: .iwant nothing
fields.value: This removes all roles that I have created from you. It's ok, I understand.

fields.name: .iwant *LITERALLYANYTHINGELSE*
fields.value: Coming up with colors is hard. So why not let me do it for you? If you type anything else after *.iwant* I'll create a color for you, which will then go through the same accept method as the normal way.

fields.name: .cleanup
fields.value: Now, normally, I go through the server roles every 15 minutes or so to make sure every role I created is attached to a member. But sometimes hiccups may occur and your server is getting flooded with roles that aren't in use. If that's the case, calling *.cleanup* will make sure I go through the role list and delete any unattached roles.

If there's anything else, contact BOTOWNERHERE. If you want to add me to your own server, click BOTINVITELINKHERE. If you also [give me manage messages](BOTINVITELINKHERE&permissions=268443712), it'll look better, but that's not needed.
